title: can't begin install
body: i use  my mac pro to play lol  today , but  the game can not begin as usual , it displays that some errors  happened . After that i delete  the game  and  go to the official site to download the game , when i click the download image, it doesn't have any reaction , so i can't download the lol  now , what should i do now ?

replies.body:
Why do people uninstall their game and *then* go to download the installer?

Anyway, there seems to be an issue with Mac users being unable to play/download the installer. I suggest just waiting it out.
